results.title: Magic lantern set effects slide (Les jouers de cartes - the card players)
results.brief_description: Hand painted magic lantern set effects slipping slide in wooden frame [Les Jouers de Cartes - the Card Players]. By sliding the effects slide, two card players’ heads turn in to a chicken (left) and a dog (right).
results.title_for_label: Magic lantern set effects slide (Les jouers de cartes - the card players)
results.description: Hand painted magic lantern set effects slipping slide in wooden frame [Les Jouers de Cartes - the Card Players]. By sliding the effects slide, two card players’ heads turn in to a chicken (left) and a dog (right).

results.title: Man and Donkey lever magic lantern slide
results.brief_description: Magic lantern set effects slide with wooden frame. The coloured slide shows a portrait of a man wearing a hat in a circular slide. An adjustable handle allows the viewer to move a beard.
results.description: Magic lantern set effects slide with wooden frame. The coloured slide shows a portrait of a man wearing a hat in a circular slide. An adjustable handle allows the viewer to move a beard.

results.title: Magic lantern set effects slide (Blind man's bluff)
results.brief_description: Wooden magic lantern set effects slide with lever. When lever is moved upwards and downwards, a boy brushes glue on to a man’s back. Another boy is ready to attach a poster to the back.
results.title_for_label: Magic lantern set effects slide (Blind man’s bluff)

results.title: Magic lantern three-panel slipping slide (Flower Bloom)
results.brief_description: Magic lantern set effects slide with wooden frame. The coloured slide shows a flower bud blooming. Two adjustable sliding pieces of glass - slide left and right to show the flower blooming. Set against a black background. Made by W.F. Archer, Liverpool, 43 Lord St and 63 South Castle St. ‘49’ and ‘R’ written in pencil on wooden frame.
results.description: Magic lantern set effects slide with wooden frame. The coloured slide shows a flower bud blooming. Two adjustable sliding pieces of glass - slide left and right to show the flower blooming. Set against a black background. Made by W.F. Archer, Liverpool, 43 Lord St and 63 South Castle St. ‘49’ and ‘R’ written in pencil on wooden frame.

results.title: Magic lantern slipping slide (Le nez d'arlequin - the harlequin's nose)
results.brief_description: Hand painted magic lantern slipping slide ‘Le Nez d’Arlequin’ -‘ The Harlequin’s Nose’ or ‘Punch with Long Nose’ with wooden frame. Manufactured by E.Mazo, Paris. By moving the slipping slide, a harlequin’s nose grows longer and three small children appear on the tip. The words ‘Punch’s Long Nose’ is etched vertically in to the glass plate.
results.title_for_label: Magic lantern slipping slide (Le nez d’arlequin - the harlequin’s nose)
results.description: Hand painted magic lantern slipping slide ‘Le Nez d’Arlequin’ -‘ The Harlequin’s Nose’ or ‘Punch with Long Nose’ with wooden frame. Manufactured by E.Mazo, Paris. By moving the slipping slide, a harlequin’s nose grows longer and three small children appear on the tip. The words ‘Punch’s Long Nose’ is etched vertically in to the glass plate.

results.title: Magic lantern slipping slide (Knight and Princess)
results.brief_description: Magic lantern set effects slide with dark wooden frame. By sliding the effects slide, a a princess pushes a knight from her window or cuts his climbing rope, resulting in his fall Set against a black background.

results.title: Magic lantern slipping slide [Boy / Girl]

results.title: House in summer magic lantern slide
results.brief_description: Magic lantern slide with wooden frame. The coloured slide shows a English style house and gardens. Several pencil marking on the wood. On the underside, ‘57’ has been written in a thick white ink.
